Donizetti [arr. Round]
Trinity Athletic and Football Co.'s Grounds, Belle Vue, Wakefield Promoted by Belle Vue (Wakefield) Prize Brass Band
1st prize £7. 2nd prize £4. 3rd prize £2 and 4th prize £1. divided between Bradford Postmen and Ackworth Parish.
March contest 1st (£1) Bradford Postmen, 2nd (10s.) Thornhill.
